message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial to you.  My initial offer is $11,500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I'm aiming for a price closer to $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,000. Would you be willing to consider $9,500 again?
